EmailTemplate.subject: Town Hall Replay & Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Thanks to all of you who attended or watched last week's Town Hall, and to those of you who submitted questions. If you couldnâ€™t make it, watch the Town Hall replay on Inside Pivotal <[[https://sites.google.com/a/pivotal.io/inside-pivotal/pivotal-town-hall]]>. Your feedback on how it went matters, so please take a few minutes to take the Town Hall survey <[[https://docs.google.com/a/pivotal.io/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf5yPpFzJzkqsuUhCAP33Gttu68E6i544sT0I7cEHt5yLuLgg/viewform]]>. Bill
